cause.description:
Finca Project is a U.S.-based non-profit organization dedicated to the recuperation of human and ecological communities in southern Costa Rica through small-scale reforestation and interactive, community education. www.fincaproject.org
1. Our generation and the next face a world with scarce environmental resources.
2. We must rethink how we value environmental resources and services.
3. Education is the key to change and progress.
4. We must create the strong environmental leaders of tomorrow today!
cause.name: Save the Costa Rican Rainforest
